title: Tottenham 'target West Brom starlet Nathan Ferguson for problem right back spot'
text:
Tottenham are ready to make a £10 million move for West Brom's highly-rated defender Nathan Ferguson.

Boss Mauricio Pochettino has made a new right back a top priority following the summer departure of Kieran Trippier.

Kyle Walker-Peters, Serge Aurier, Moussa Sissoko and Juan Foyth have all been used since England international Trippier joined Atletico Madrid.

Tottenham are tracking West Brom's Nathan Ferguson to fill their problem right-back spot

Spurs scouts are raving about Ferguson, who has been playing left back for the Baggies but can also play on the right.

Crystal Palace are also tracking the 19-year-old.

Championship leaders West Brom hope to keep Birmingham-born Ferguson and extend his contract.
description: Tottenham are ready to make a £10 million move for West Brom's highly-rated defender Nathan Ferguson.
